pageContext.claim: “I've saved their second amendment. You wouldn't have a second amendment right now if it wasn't for me.”
pageContext.analysis: This is bunk. The Trump administration has not needed to defend any legal challenges to the Second Amendment because none has been filed. Trump is most likely referring to his opposition to several gun-control measures proposed in Congress or around the country, but to describe those as an existential attack on gun rights is deceptive.
